name: One Circle
description:
Enter this beautiful pixel art puzzle game and complete increasingly challenging levels.



In One Circle, you need to make well-calculated moves in order to collect all the balls on the board.
Drag the balls of the same color together, horizontally or vertically, to join them.
At each level, a different challenge. How far can you go?
There are several mechanics to be used in the game.

Featuring

  • Beautiful animations
  • Minimalist interface
  • Dynamic and comforting audio
  • Different handcrafted puzzles
  • Original music
